Graphics: small cheerful orange smiling sun icon integrated near the middle-right of the composition and several small cartoon white clouds with light blue shading placed around words to balance the layout. Styling rules: thick black vector-style outline around the isolated elements (text and graphics) ONLY; no square frame or border around the entire image. Composition: centered, tightly stacked hierarchy with 'HOLNAP' as the dominant focal word, slight arching of the top line, high-contrast, print-ready clean vector design with crisp edges, flat color fills, and no background texture or photographic effects. Isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows.
